OOC: Yggdrasil is still inside the base, he just talks through the
speakers.

Bic:

Yggdrasil: If you're saying that most Maximals are kind-hearted,
you're right, but I wouldn't mind tearing the spark out of you and
setting it in an electric chamber just for the fun of seeing it
twitch. I'm not like most maximals and if it was up to me, there would
have been no decepticon or predacon left on cybertron after the great
wars.

--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, EmprzAnastazia@a... wrote:
> In a message dated 2/28/03 6:46:58 AM Central Standard Time, 
> wingedwarrior41@h... writes:
> 
> 
> > His tone none too softer, Yggdrasil decided he had to make them wait.
> > 
> > Yggdrasil: I'm afraid none of you can go in for now, as there is a
> > strategic meeting taking place. I'll call Empath, though.
> > 
> > He switched to personal comm with Empath.
> > 
> > Yggdrasil: Empath, there seems to be a Decepticon who wants to talk to
> > you just outside the base.
> > 
> > 
> 
> Laughing. "You are worse than Starscream!" She looked at the other
2. "None 
> of us care about what is going on. We just want to feel welcomed &
relax." 
> Then looking up at Yggdrasil. "I thought the autobots & their
decendents were 
> sympathetic to all creatures? Unless you have forgotten that
already!?" She 
> wasn't playing a hand, but making a valid point. She knew her
enemies & knew 
> them well. Or at least she used to. Had they changed so much over the 
> centuries to become so ruthless & cold hearted? She smirked. If so,
then they 
> were becoming the ones that they so valiantly fought against. 
> 
> She was loving this.
